Text: Me̩ ki fʼo̩kakachi fa Zayo̩n,
O̩jo̩ kʼane̩ chubi i che, kʼe̩wñ de̩ bulubulu,
Una do̩mo̩ alie̩ e̩wñ o̩gba ma,
E̩ li ma, ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼamanya ejuwe̩,
Ekuku-ma dab ekuku o̩kogu o̩kogu,
Eju-ma kʼamone̩ li ma jʼane̩ ali gbigbili,
Ma gwo̩ko̩ wa dabe̩ne̩ kʼamagbiti,
E̩ne̩ du akʼekeji-wñ e̩che̩ n,
Ma muro̩ bʼewo le̩ ma,
Ane̩-ile̩ aga o̩gba-ma,
Taku Jihofa anʼomu-wñ data
Ama i chaka che ifa-i, Jihofa aka-i,
me̩ ki la fʼe̩do̩-me̩ na i ki chʼukpo-me̩ ofofo n.
E̩ne̩ ma, abe̩k i adabi awʼo̩,
Fʼo̩kakachi fa Zayo̩n;
kʼamone̩ wa jo̩.
Amatama, ku ma chʼama che e̩wñ ñw Jihofa,
Taku Jihofa jogu tod ane̩-wñ,
Taku Jihofa dohi, oñ i ka ñw abo-wñ kakini.
Omi muda akʼabogu o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ le̩ bʼume̩ te̩ nyʼo̩najiji,
O ane̩-i, e̩ ki railo n;
Ame̩, ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ oko, me̩ ki railo n,
E̩do̩-me̩ ki bo̩, ame̩ amo̩ma Zayo̩n,
Ajita ugwo̩ka du ako̩ ñw o̩ka wit,
Omi adʼo̩do̩ o̩do̩
Ame̩ aje̩ kʼefu, e̩do̩-me̩ la abo̩,
Ame̩ ama ka kʼomi dʼalumeji abo Israe̩l,
Tak i awatu anubi-wñ,
Omi ñʼadʼAfu-mi danyʼamadu e̩ne̩ke̩le̩
Tak u nakʼe̩wñ uno̩ nye̩ña efojale kpai ane̩-ile̩, e̩bie̩ kpai una kpai oduduna ki dago waala.
Olu arida e̩chubi, ochu la arida e̩bie̩, o̩gba tak o̩jo̩ lile e-Jihofa ki abailo le̩ lewa.
Oñ i awatu ka kʼe̩ne̩ du ki akwa do̩ odu Jihofa afʼo̩wo̩ tane̩; todu abo ku ma mufu ajo̩ oj uwo Zayo̩n kpʼefu Je̩rusale̩m, alu ki Jihofa ka le̩. Oñ abo ki Jihofa ado̩ ma ajʼef e̩bo̩bo̩ amone̩ le̩.
